sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

revisionDesc.change: Initial TEI transcription from PanGeo Partners, Inc.

body.p: Hans Clausen, one-story brick building, 6330 South California Avenue. Cost, $3,500.
Andrew Rasmussen, two-story brick building, 2215 Laporte Avenue. Cost, $5,000.
Ira Isaacson, two-story brick building, 4615 Monticello Avenue. Cost, $6,000.
J. O. Svenson, two-story frame building, 4507 Nevada Avenue. Cost, $7,000.
A. Anderson, one-story frame building, 4510 Altgeld Street. Cost, $1,500.
O. Osterberg, two-story brick building, 3733 Agatite Avenue. Cost, $5,000.
O. Osterberg, two-story brick building, 3922 Ridgeway Avenue. Cost, $5,000.
E. Nelson, one-story frame building, 2329 West 112th Street. Cost, $3,000.
Mrs. J. Olsen, two-story brick building, 6925 North Clark Street. Cost, $6,000.
R. Matteson, three-story brick building, 1420 Leland Avenue. Cost, $24,000.
